xyz.fsgik.common.reflect

类 FsReflect

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.fsgik.common.reflect.FsReflect

extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for reflection.

    • 方法详细资料

      • load

        @Nullable
public static <T> T load(java.lang.String className)
        Returns new instance for given class name. This method first uses Class.forName(String) to load given class, then call the none-arguments constructor to create instance. If loading failed, return null.
        类型参数:
        T - type of result
        参数:
        className - given clas name
        返回:
        new instance for given class name or null

      • getLastName

        public static java.lang.String getLastName(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Returns last name of given class. The last name is sub-string after last dot, for example:

        String is last name of java.lang.String.

        参数:
        cls - given class
        返回:
        last name of given class

      • getRawType

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.Class<?> getRawType(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Returns raw type of given type, the given type must be a Class or ParameterizedType. Returns null if given type neither be Class nor ParameterizedType.
        参数:
        type - given type
        返回:
        raw type of given type or null

      • getActualTypeArgument

        public static java.lang.reflect.Type getActualTypeArgument(java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType type,
                                                           int index)
        Returns actual type argument of given parameterized type at specified index
        参数:
        type - given parameterized type
        index - specified index
        返回:
        actual type argument at specified index

      • getUpperBound

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Type getUpperBound(java.lang.reflect.WildcardType type)
        Returns upper bound type of given type (? extends). If given type has lower bounds (? super), return null.
        参数:
        type - given type
        返回:
        upper bound type of given type or null

      • getLowerBound

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Type getLowerBound(java.lang.reflect.WildcardType type)
        Returns lower bound type of given type (? super). If given type has no lower bounds, return null.
        参数:
        type - given type
        返回:
        lower bound type of given type or null

      • getField

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Field getField(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                                                    java.lang.String name)
        Returns field of specified name from given type (first getField then getDeclaredField). Returns null if not found.
        参数:
        type - given type
        name - specified field name
        返回:
        field of specified name from given type or null

      • getMethod

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                      java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Returns method of specified name from given type (first getField then getDeclaredField). Returns null if not found.
        参数:
        type - given type
        name - specified method name
        parameterTypes - parameter types
        返回:
        method of specified name from given type or null

      • newInstance

        @Nullable
public static <T> T newInstance(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Creates a new instance of given type with empty constructor. Return null if failed.
        类型参数:
        T - type of instance
        参数:
        type - given type
        返回:
        a new instance of given type with empty constructor or null

        参数:
        cls - given class
        返回:
        wrapper class if given class is primitive, else return itself

      • hasClass

        Returns whether current runtime has specified class.
        参数:

        返回:
        whether current runtime has specified class

      • isAssignableFrom

        public static boolean isAssignableFrom(java.lang.Class<?> targetType,
                                       java.lang.Class<?> sourceType)
        Returns whether target type can be assigned by source type with Class.isAssignableFrom(Class). If given type is primitive, it will be converted to its wrapper type.
        参数:
        targetType - target type
        sourceType - source type
        返回:
        whether target type can be assigned by source type

      • isAssignableFrom

        public static boolean isAssignableFrom(java.lang.reflect.Type targetType,
                                       java.lang.reflect.Type sourceType)
        Returns whether target type can be assigned by source type. If given type is primitive, it will be converted to its wrapper type. This method is similar as isAssignableFrom(Class, Class) but supports Type.

        Note in this type, Object can be assigned from any type, WildcardType can not assign to or be assigned from any type.

        参数:
        targetType - target type
        sourceType - source type
        返回:
        whether target type can be assigned by source type

      • getGenericSuperType

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType getGenericSuperType(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                                                                           java.lang.Class<?> target)
        Returns generic super type with actual arguments from given type to given target type (target type is super type of given type).

        For example, these types: 

             private static interface Z<B, T, U, R> {}
     private static class ZS implements Z<String, Integer, Long, Boolean> {}
        The result of this method: 
             getGenericSuperType(ZS.class, Z.class);
        will be: 
             Z<String, Integer, Long, Boolean>
        Note given type must be subtype of target type, if it is not, return null.
        参数:
        type - given type
        target - target type
        返回:
        generic super type with actual arguments

      • getTypeParameterMapping

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>,java.lang.reflect.Type> getTypeParameterMapping(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Returns a mapping of type parameters for given type. The key of mapping is type parameter, and the value is actual type argument or inherited type parameter of subtype.

        For example, these types: 

             private static class X extends Y<Integer, Long>{}
     private static class Y<K, V> implements Z<Float, Double, V> {}
     private static interface Z<T, U, R>{}
        The result of this method 
             parseActualTypeMapping(x)
        will be: 
             T -> Float
     U -> Double
     R -> V
     K -> Integer
     V -> Long
        参数:
        type - given type
        返回:
        a mapping of type parameters for given type

      • replaceType

        public static java.lang.reflect.Type replaceType(java.lang.reflect.Type type,
                                                 java.lang.reflect.Type matcher,
                                                 java.lang.reflect.Type replacement,
                                                 boolean deep)
        Replaces the types in given type (including itself) that same with the matcher with replacement. This method supports:
        • ParameterizedType: rawType, ownerType, actualTypeArguments;
        • WildcardType: upperBounds, lowerBounds;
        • GenericArrayType: componentType;
        If the deep parameter is true, this method will recursively replace unmatched types.

        If no type is matched or the type is not supported for replacing, return given type itself.

        参数:
        type - type to be replaced
        matcher - matcher type
        replacement - replacement type
        deep - whether to recursively replace unmatched types
        返回:
        type after replacing
